item.title: 8 Open-World Games Where Combat Is Exhausting, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Elden Ring's complex boss battles physically exhaust players, making combat tiring and rewarding.
  • Kingdom Come: Deliverance requires patience and skill in melee combat, leaving players mentally fatigued.
  • Monster Hunter Wilds drains players with intense combat and stamina mechanics, adding layers of exhaustion.

Open-world games tend to prioritize the exploration of the open worlds they have created, leaving mechanics such as combat on the back burner. While some open-world games do a great job of creating enticing combat, there are moments in these titles where the combat can become quite exhausting for players who might feel like they need a break after a couple of battles.

The exhaustion of combat in open-world games hits at various levels, with some games having incredible combat but still being exhausting due to the stress it causes players, while other open-world games can be deemed as having exhausting combat due to it doing nothing new or different for the title. Therefore, these are a few open-world titles where combat is exhausting, ranked by how tired the combat leaves players, be it from being repetitive or physically taxing.

8 Elden Ring

Boss Battles Have Players Physically Exhausted

6 Images
6 Images
Elden Ring
10 /10
68
9.1 /10
Released
February 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
From Software
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X
Powered by

Elden Ring may come as a surprise to be seen as a game with exhausting combat, but this doesn't have to be a bad thing. Elden Ring expanded upon the souls-like genre by allowing players to explore a diverse and interesting map while also facing off against various challenging bosses that each have their own unique sequence of attacks that the player would need to learn if they hope to defeat them.

With so many bosses available to be beaten, learning the move sets of each one and getting skilled enough to easily defeat them takes a lot of time and effort, which can make the combat of Elden Ring quite exhausting. Those who have played Elden Ring are likely familiar with dying to certain foes countless times and being forced to start combat with them again and again in the hopes of eventually defeating them, which can become a tiring process. However, once the foe is down, the adrenaline of victory pushes players onto the next foe.

7 Kingdom Come: Deliverance

Swordplay That Tires The Mind

Kingdom Come: Deliverance
10
7.6 /10
Released
February 13, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Alcohol
Developer(s)
Warhorse Studios
Platform(s)
PS4, Xbox One, PC, Switch
Powered by

Kingdom Come: Deliverance is another open-world title that surprisingly has fascinating combat, but that doesn't mean that it isn't exhausting. With a heavy focus on melee weaponry, players aren't just swinging around a sword like they would in RPGs such as Skyrim . In these epic medieval duels, it's important for the player to practice patience when taking on a foe.

Like many aspects of Kingdom Come: Deliverance , combat is quite a challenge as players parry, block, and jab their way to success. There is hardly a chance of spamming attacks over and over in the hopes of winning, making players look for alternative ways to deal with problems so they aren't stuck dueling for their lives, which may leave them feeling exhausted in their adventures.

6 Monster Hunter Wilds

Stock Up On Rations Or Else

10 Images
10 Images
Monster Hunter Wilds
58
8.2 /10
Released
February 28, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Violence, Blood, Crude Humor
Developer(s)
Capcom
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, PC
Powered by

Exhaustion doesn't just come from the type of combat players face in open-world games, but also due to the stamina mechanics available in those games. Monster Hunter Wilds is one of these titles that puts players beyond their limits with intense combat against various epic monsters on multiple open-world maps for the player to explore.

The longer the player is out on an expedition, the more likely they are to permanently lose their stamina. Those who haven't cooked up any fresh meat or brought rations with them will likely find themselves getting exhausted no matter what monster they face, as they will have no way to increase their stamina bar back to the max. Other than this, certain foes can be quite frustrating for players, tiring them out with their aggressive attacks as they leap across the forests and plains they fight within.

5 Ghost of Tsushima

Starts Out Exhausting But Gets Better

Ghost of Tsushima
9 /10
43
8.9 /10
Released
July 17, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language, Partial Nudity
Developer(s)
Sucker Punch
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5
Powered by

When first starting Ghost of Tsushima , players may likely feel that the combat isn't for them, especially as certain foes may take a lot longer to defeat, which can tire some players out from wanting to take part in the phenomenal combat of this even greater open-world title.

As the player progresses throughout the story and adventure in Ghost of Tsushima , they will begin to unlock various ghost weapons and unique stances that turn the combat of Ghost of Tsushima into something interesting that many players can enjoy. Similarly to Kingdom Come: Deliverance , players cannot just smash buttons as certain stances and attacks work better on certain enemies. Doing this will only exhaust players.

4 The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

Not The Most Engaging Part Of The Game

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
9 /10
54
9.4 /10
Released
May 19, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Use of Alcohol, Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content
Developer(s)
CD Projekt Red
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
Powered by

Players may be surprised to see a game that focuses on a monster hunter would have such simplistic combat. While the combat in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt may not be as exhausting as some titles. There is still a certain amount of simplicity to it that causes many players to prefer to play the game on an easier difficulty, so that these battles against both monsters and humans go a lot quicker, so the player can jump right back into the incredible stories of this RPG title.

One of the biggest critiques of The Witcher 3 's combat is how clunky it feels. In its attempt to make every battle feel somewhat cinematic, players struggle to fight off these foes, leaving many players to feel tired once the enemy is down.

3 The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim

Combat Has Never Been So Basic

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
8 /10
9.0 /10
Released
October 28, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol
Developer(s)
Bethesda Game Studios
Platform(s)
PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One
Powered by

Although Skyrim is by far one of the greatest open-world RPGs to ever be created, that doesn't mean that it is a completely perfect game. The majority of the love for Skyrim comes from its huge world to explore and astounding side quests that players have gotten lost in for countless hours.

Even with all this in mind, the combat is one of its weakest elements, with many players finding it to be quite simplistic and therefore unengaging. Certain types of fighting in Skyrim can be exhausting, with enemies at harder difficulties taking too many hits to kill, with some players finding the magic in Skyrim to be a step down from Oblivion . Overall, many players take on the role of stealth archer to get through combat quicker.

2 Grand Theft Auto 5

Bullet Sponges Make For Poor Targets

5 Images
5 Images
Grand Theft Auto 5
9 /10
148
8.9 /10
Released
September 17, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Mature Humor, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Developer(s)
Rockstar North
Platform(s)
Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Xbox 360, PC, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5
Powered by

In Grand Theft Auto 5 , one of the most exhausting things about this open world is its combat. While racing cars and the story of Grand Theft Auto 5 may have hooked players, the gunplay left many – especially those who enjoyed Grand Theft Auto 4 – looking for something more.

The only thing that still brought a thrill to the combat of Grand Theft Auto 5 was the assortment of weaponry the player could purchase, though certain guns would always be favored over others. Other than this, as seen in Skyrim , enemies don't become difficult through tactics but instead take more hits to kill and therefore become quite boring as bullet sponges that waste the player's ammo.

1 Sea Of Thieves

Chase Down Other Players For Hours

Sea of Thieves
7.7 /10
Released
March 20, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Crude Humor, Use of Alcohol, Violence
Developer(s)
Rare
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X
Powered by

By far, the most exhausting combat in an open-world title can be found within Sea of Thieves . In a game about pirate adventures, players will fight off fellow pirate players and the undead ships that sail across the seas. However, when taking on other crews, this can be quite a lengthy process, especially when battling at sea.

Before players can even start firing the canons, they must first catch up with their target ship. This could mean sailing in a single direction for a while in the hopes of catching up. Then begins the battle of who can sink the other ship quicker. Between patching up the ship and firing the canons, both crews are likely to become stressed and exhausted as resources begin to run low. If one ship never truly sinks and both must escape, doing this again in Sea of Thieves too soon could be the end.

item.title: Best RPGs For Couples To Play Together
item.description:
Summary

  • RPGs are enjoyable for couples - co-op games enhance the experience by allowing partners to play together seamlessly.
  • Titles like "Haven" and "Sea of Stars" offer exciting co-op functionality for couples looking to explore together.
  • Games like "Stardew Valley" and "Baldur's Gate 3" provide a relaxing yet engaging co-op experience for couples to enjoy.

Role-playing games are a blast to play through, and most people assume that these titles are made to cater to a single player. However, this isn't always the case, especially when some RPGs boast incredible qualities that will engross couples to no end.

Games with co-op functionality are an obvious mention here, with two players collaborating to make progress in a memorable role-playing experience. Even if games may lack this feature, couples will still love swapping controllers in these amazing RPGs.

Haven

A Fun RPG With A Focus On A Beautiful, Forbidden Romance

Haven
Adventure
RPG
Systems
Released
December 3, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M
Powered by

The Game Bakers has done a great job of making their CV as varied as possible, and Haven is no exception. After a boss rush game that wowed the masses, the developer swerved and let players enjoy a relatively laid-back RPG about cleansing the land as a couple in exile.

While the game's co-op functionality may not be the best (which is decidedly odd, given the game's focus on its central relationship), the romance at the heart of things is steamy and emotional enough to keep couples occupied for the long haul.

Diablo 4

Couch Co-op Is Great In This Title

Diablo 4
9 /10
101
7.5 /10
Released
June 6, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language
Powered by

Players who want to enjoy a fun ARPG with a focus on looting and dungeon crawling will find any of the Diablo games to be perfect for a co-op experience with their loved one. Diablo 4 continues this tradition, with split-screen co-op feeling great in this title.

Menus are carefully curated to work in split-screen, ensuring that players aren't frustrated when sharing a screen. A couple will love powering through this title, taking out bosses, and finding powerful equipment that makes them look (and feel) like gods.

Sea Of Stars

An Update Added Co-op Functionality To This Beloved Indie JRPG

Sea of Stars
9.0 /10
Released
August 29, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ Due To Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, Mild Language
Powered by

While Sea of Stars has some issues, the amazing sprite work ensures that players will love looking at this game's visuals. While the game was single-player for the longest time, an update has added co-op functionality for up to three players.

Even with two players, co-op is seamless and ensures that two players will have a great time exploring this gorgeous world. Killing Dwellers and hunting down the alchemist responsible for their creation makes for a time that elevates Sea of Stars in the eyes of many.

South Park: The Stick Of Truth

A Hilarious RPG That Couples Will Love To Watch Together, Like A Very Long Episode

South Park: The Stick of Truth
8 /10
7.4 /10
Released
March 4, 2014

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Mature Humor, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Violence
Powered by

Couples who want to sit through a long, interactive South Park story will love what The Stick of Truth brings to the table. The game's hilarious over-the-top moments will leave fans gasping for breath as they play a New Kid who is playing an elaborate role-playing game with the kids of South Park .

Beating up the homeless, literally finding Jesus in the church, and using farts as deadly weapons are just a few of the many ways The Stick of Truth stands out as one of the most authentic adaptations of an IP couples will love experiencing together.

Divinity: Original Sin 2

An Epic CRPG That Couples Can Tackle In Co-op

Divinity: Original Sin 2
8.6 /10
Released
September 14, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Sexual Themes, Violence
Powered by

Larian Studios has done a commendable job of reviving its RPGs by making them accessible to all and adding unique features to entice new fans into trying out this genre. The most notable way they've achieved this is with the inclusion of co-op mechanics.

Divinity: Original Sin 2 is no exception, with players loving the act of experiencing the game's epic adventure with their partner. Dealing with the Voidwoken, using Sourcery, and becoming heroes makes for a fun adventure that players can't get enough of.

Project Zomboid

Combines Gameplay Elements From The Sims With Challenging Survival Gameplay

7 Images
7 Images
Project Zomboid
9.2 /10
Released
November 8, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
m
Powered by

The Sims is one of the most popular video game franchises around, and Project Zomboid combines some aspects of its gameplay with a hardcore survival loop where the smallest mistakes are punished.

This may make this game unfair for beginners, but couples who collaborate can educate each other on what to do. In case they're stuck in a tight spot, they can collaborate to ensure that the wave of zombies doesn't overwhelm them.

Stardew Valley

Couples Will Love Tending To A Farm Together, Fighting Monsters, And Exploring The Town

Stardew Valley
74
9.2 /10
Released
February 26, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E for Everyone (Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, Mild Language, Simulated Gambling, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco)
Powered by

One of the most calming RPGs fans can check out, it's easy to see why Stardew Valley has become such a major phenomenon. Tending to a farm, interacting with charming NPCs, and engaging in a bit of simple combat all form a compelling gameplay loop that fans will love.

The best part about Stardew Valley for couples is the inclusion of co-op, allowing partners to combine their efforts and ensure that their farmstead is tended to at all times. It's a great game for players to unwind as they let their creativity flourish with their loved ones.

Baldur's Gate 3

One Of The Greatest Modern CRPGs Of All Time, That's A Blast In Co-op

Baldur's Gate 3
9 /10
139
9.7 /10
Released
August 3, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Baldur's Gate 3 is one of the greatest modern RPGs of all time. The fact that players can check out this game in co-op is the cherry on top of an RPG loaded with so much content that couples will have a great time experiencing everything this title has to offer.

Getting rid of the illithid parasite in an epic adventure spanning multiple Acts makes for a great time. Co-op players can enter the game with different builds and uncover a host of unique solutions to quests and the like that players wouldn't have uncovered on their own.

item.title: Fans Hoping To Get A Switch 2 For The Holidays May Be In Luck
item.description:
Nintendo Switch 2 part manufacturers have adjusted their sales forecasts for the third quarter of 2025, which could spell good news for consumers looking to get a new console for the holidays. In short, a surge in Switch 2 part demand by Nintendo for two of its manufacturing partners could lead to increased production and inventory ahead of the 2025 holiday shopping rush.

Since its June 5 launch, the Switch 2 has become the fastest-selling console in Nintendo's company history, with over six million units sold as of July 24. However, the Switch 2's stock has remained in flux since release, as retailers like Amazon have utilized an email notification and priority interest system to get Nintendo's new console in the hands of legitimate buyers. The shortages prompted an apology from Nintendo president Shuntaro Furukawa in late June, who stated that the company would redouble its efforts to meet the demand for the Switch 2.

Nintendo is Ramping Up Switch 2 Production Ahead Of the Holidays

Though the 2025 holiday shopping season is still months away, Nintendo and its partners are already making preparations. As spotted by GoNintendo, two of Nintendo's manufacturing partners, PixArt and Hosiden, have increased their sales forecasts for the rest of Q3 2025. The change in forecasts was due to an increased demand for Switch 2 parts, a potential sign that Nintendo is making efforts to produce more consoles and stock up on inventory ahead of the holiday shopping season. The sales forecasts for Hosiden and PixArt were posted on Bluesky by Nintendo Patents Watch.

Hosiden is an assembler of Switch parts and accessories, and has revised its Q3 2025 forecast from May 9 to include a 10.3% increase in expected net sales. The adjusted prediction came after Hosiden received additional orders from Nintendo following the Switch 2's June 5 launch. As for PixArt, the company that makes the mouse sensors for Nintendo's Joy-Con 2 controllers, they expect a sales increase of between 11% and 19% through September. Similar to Hosiden, PixArt's forecast adjustments were also due to Nintendo's increased demand for Switch 2 consoles and peripherals.

Though Switch 2 manufacturing is firing up ahead of the 2025 holiday season, the move comes at an uncertain time for the global economy. Due to the Trump administration's tariffs on goods from various countries, Nintendo has increased the price of the original Switch family of consoles and accessories in the US, with the Switch Lite now starting at $229 instead of $199.

While the tariff situation remains fluid, it is unclear if Nintendo will increase the price of the Switch 2 console and any related bundles before the winter holidays. Given that sales of the Switch 2 remain strong despite the inventory woes, only time will tell what additional moves Nintendo will make.

item.title: Roblox: Anime Rails Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Anime Rails Codes
  • How to Redeem Anime Rails Codes
  • How to Get More Anime Rails Codes

Anime Rails is a representative of the survival genre, in which players have to travel through the wastelands. On your way, you will encounter various buildings and enemies, from which you will take both valuable and junk items. To effectively progress in the runs, you should use Anime Rails codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they contain various free goodies. Among the rewards, you will find various amounts of Cash that will be useful to you for obtaining new classes. However, you should hurry, as their validity period is limited.

Updated August 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several new codes have been added, each giving free rewards to claim right away. They can offer a helpful boost no matter what stage of the game you’re in. If you’ve already used older codes, these are a good way to collect something extra. More freebies may arrive in future updates, so it’s worth coming back to check.

All Anime Rails Codes

Working Anime Rails Codes

  • INFINITY – Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • 12MVISITS – Redeem this code to get free rewards (NEW)
  • 11MVISITS – Redeem this code to get free cash (NEW)
  • GENERAL – Redeem this code to get free cash (NEW)

Expired Anime Rails Codes

  • 10MVISITS
  • DBZ
  • 7MVISITS
  • GAMERETURNED
  • 6MVISITS
  • ARISE
  • 5MVISITS
  • 90KLikes
  • 5000CCU
  • ATOMIC
  • 4MVISITS
  • 3MVISITS
  • 2MVISITS
  • 40kLikes
  • NIGHTMARE
  • 3000CCU
  • TONY
  • SORRYFORBUG
  • 1000CCU
  • 1MVISITS
  • NARU
  • 10kLikes
  • 7KLIKES
  • PIRATE
  • THANKS
  • NEWHUB
  • 1000LIKES
  • 1500LIKES
  • 4000LIKES
  • 2500LIKES
  • BATTLEROYAL
  • JJK
  • 100LIKES
  • QUEST
  • 200LIKES

The main task of players in Anime Rails is to survive in the wasteland. To do this, you need to find items for sale as well as food for your dragon. If this creature is hungry, you will not be able to move on and will most likely end the run. Fortunately, the game has different classes that differ not only in stats but also in starting items. To get them, you will have to spend quite a lot of Cash, which can be earned using Anime Rails codes.

You only need a few codes to get more than 200 Cash. However, it is worth noting that this method has one limitation, namely, a temporary one. Each code added to the game expires after a certain time after its release. Therefore, we do not recommend that you delay their redemption.

How to Redeem Anime Rails Codes

Using Anime Rails codes is no different from most other Roblox games. This feature is available to players from the first minutes of the game, even before they start the first run. But to get rewards, you will first have to join the developers' Roblox group. Once you've done that, follow these simple steps:

  • Launch Anime Rails .
  • Then, click on the Codes button on the left side of the screen.
  • Next, enter the code in the new window and hit enter to claim the rewards.

How to Get More Anime Rails Codes

As with other Roblox experiences, Anime Rails gets new Roblox codes as players reach various combo milestones. So you should visit the official social media pages of the developers, where you will find all the news, including codes, first-hand:

  • Jawad2652 Roblox group
  • Anime Rails Discord server
Roblox

WHERE TO PLAY

PC, iOS, Xbox One, PS4

item.title: Roblox: Arcade Basketball Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Even though Arcade Basketball has a simple gameplay, your victory depends directly on your skills. Whether it is defense or attack, you need to use the right skills to run and earn Coins. For this reason, new players are quite slow to farm money. And to fix this, you should use Arcade Basketball codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they contain various rewards from the developers. Most of them grant players different amounts of Coins. However, their validity is limited, so it is recommended that you redeem them as soon as possible.

Updated August 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several new codes available right now that can give you coins and spins. Some require following specific users or joining a Roblox group, but they all offer useful rewards to help you progress. Make sure to redeem these bonuses while they last. This guide is regularly updated, so checking back often can help you stay on top of new freebies.

All Arcade Basketball Codes

Working Arcade Basketball Codes

  • FREESPINS - Redeem this code to get Spins (NEW)
  • 5KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins (NEW)
  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins (NEW)
  • 4700Likes! - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins (NEW)
  • THANKS - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins (NEW)
  • Release - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins
  • Group - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins (Requires joining a Roblox group)
  • SkeletorAngel - Redeem this code to get 500 XP (Requires following the @SkeletorAngel user)
  • SOLOSEBEE - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins (Requires following the @SOLOSEBEE user)
  • 4p0 - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins (Requires following the @4p0 user)

Expired Arcade Basketball Codes

There are no expired codes in Arcade Basketball . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

Arcade Basketball offers players an exciting basketball experience. Instead of playing in the usual big fields, you will have to play a maximum of 2v2 with one basket. But this does not mean that it will be easy for you to win. Depending on whether you play defense or offense, you have access to different moves. Using them at the right time, you can easily both score goals and protect the basket from opponents. And to diversify the matches, players can customize their characters by buying crates with items. And if you want to earn a lot of money from the beginning of the game, then Arcade Basketball is what you need.

Even a few of these codes will reward you with more than 500 Coins, which is enough to buy one crate. But it is worth noting that after some time, the codes expire. For this reason, you need to use them while they are still active.

How to Redeem Arcade Basketball Codes

At first glance, it may seem that Arcade Basketball has the same code redemption feature as most other Roblox experiences. However, in reality, most codes require certain conditions to be met, such as joining a group or following a user. But by following these steps, you can easily claim your rewards without any problems:

  • Launch Arcade Basketball .
  • Open the Menu by clicking on the corresponding button in the lower left corner of the screen.
  • Next, select the Codes option.
  • After that, you must make sure that you have fulfilled a certain code condition and enter it in the field.
  • Finally, click the Confirm button to claim free goodies.

How to Get More Arcade Basketball Codes

To avoid missing out on new Arcade Basketball codes, you should bookmark this guide, as we are going to update it over time, like our other Roblox codes articles. In addition, you can visit the official social media pages of the developers. There, players will find all the latest news about upcoming events, updates, and of course, codes:

  • Arcade Basketball Roblox group
  • Arcade Basketball Discord server
